name: POPOTA
description:
[THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE MINI JAM 77]

POPOTA was the last dragon in the universe, she was born in hell and destined to be the daughter of LUCIFER and rule hell as a demon, but deep down she wanted to be a dragon, finally she found the courage to leave her father and become a DRAGON.

- IDEA and CODE by: AME NO HI.
- ART by: SPOOKTO.
- AUDIO by: GAB FITZGERALD.
- MUSIC "borrowed" from: 8-BIT MOOSIC.
- FONT is SILVER by: POPPYWORKS.

ver.S is dead, long live POPOTA.
